trans-unit.source: Represents a user identity authenticated using forms authentication.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用窗体身份验证身份验证的用户标识。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The FormsIdentity class is used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> when a user is authenticated with forms authentication.
trans-unit.target: FormsIdentity 类由<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>用户进行身份验证时使用 forms 身份验证。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the FormsIdentity class is created using the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> that is decrypted from the forms-authentication cookie or from the URL.
trans-unit.target: 使用创建 FormsIdentity 类的实例<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket>从窗体身份验证 cookie 或从 URL 解密。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket>

trans-unit.source: The new instance of the FormsIdentity class is used to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that is set as the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: FormsIdentity 类的新实例用于构造新<xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal>对象设置为<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>属性</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>的值</xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The authentication ticket upon which this identity is based.
trans-unit.target: 此标识基于身份验证票证。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref> class based on the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref>类基于指定的标识。

trans-unit.source: The identity upon which this identity is based.
trans-unit.target: 此标识所依据的标识。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of authenticated identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取经过身份验证标识的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of authenticated identity.
trans-unit.target: 经过身份验证标识的类型。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns "Forms".
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回"窗体"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of claims that are associated with this identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此标识关联的声明的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of claims.
trans-unit.target: 声明集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a copy of the current <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取一份当前<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 一份当前<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether authentication took place.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否发生了身份验证。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user name of the forms identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取窗体标识的用户名称。

trans-unit.source: The Name property returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> supplied to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Name 属性返回的值<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A>属性从<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket>提供给构造函数。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user name of the forms identity.
trans-unit.target: 窗体标识的用户名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket"></xref> for the forms-authentication user identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket"></xref>的窗体身份验证用户标识。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket"></xref> supplied to the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity.%23ctor%2A> constructor for the current object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket"> </xref>提供给<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity.%23ctor%2A>当前对象的构造函数。
